mapper.select: SELECT E.EMPLOYEENO, E.passwd, E.FK_POSITIONNO, E.FK_TEAMNO, E.Name, E.SECURITYLEVEL, E.Email, E.Bank, substr(E.Mobile, 1, 3) || '-' || substr(E.Mobile, 4, 3) || '-' || substr(E.Mobile, 8) AS Mobile, substr(E.directcall, 1, 2) || ')' || substr(E.directcall, 3, 4) || '-' || substr(E.directcall, 7) AS directcall, E.account, to_char(E.registerdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS registerdate, E.Status, E.REASONFORLEAVING, E.lastDate, E.MOTIVE, E.PROFILEIMG, E.Address, to_char(E.birth, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS birth, E.FK_DEPARTMENTNO , D.departmentname FROM tbl_employee E LEFT JOIN tbl_department D ON E.FK_DEPARTMENTNO = D.DEPARTMENTNO WHERE E.employeeNo = to_number(#{id}) AND E.passwd = #{passwd} AND E.status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_employee(EMPLOYEENO, FK_POSITIONNO, FK_TEAMNO, PASSWD, NAME, SECURITYLEVEL, EMAIL, MOBILE, DIRECTCALL, BANK, ACCOUNT, REGISTERDATE, STATUS, ADDRESS, BIRTH, FK_DEPARTMENTNO) values(to_number(#{employeeNo}), to_number(#{FK_positionNo}), to_number(#{FK_teamNo}), #{passwd}, #{name}, to_number(#{securityLevel}), #{email}, #{mobile}, #{directCall}, #{bank}, #{account}, to_date(#{registerDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_number(#{status}), #{address}, to_date(#{birth}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_number(#{FK_departmentNo}))
mapper.select: select departmentNo, departmentname from tbl_department order by departmentNo asc
select positionno, positionname from tbl_position order by positionno asc
select teamNo, teamName from tbl_team where fk_departmentNo = to_number(#{departmentNo}) order by teamNo asc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_annual(annualno, fk_employeeno, year, occurannual, overannual, addannual) values(annualseq.nextval, #{employeeNo}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy'), 15,0,0)
mapper.select: select ADRSBNO, FIRSTNAME||MIDDLENAME||LASTNAME AS name, COMPANY,DEPARTMENT,RANK,EMAIL,PHONENO,DIRECTCALL from tbl_addressbook where fk_employeeNo = to_number(#{fk_employeeNo}) order by ADRSBNO desc
select ADRSBNO, FIRSTNAME||MIDDLENAME||LASTNAME AS name, COMPANY,DEPARTMENT,RANK,EMAIL,PHONENO,DIRECTCALL from tbl_addressbook where fk_employeeNo = to_number(#{fk_employeeNo}) order by ADRSBNO desc

select FIRSTNAME||MIDDLENAME||LASTNAME AS name, COMPANY,DEPARTMENT,RANK,EMAIL,PHONENO,DIRECTCALL from tbl_addressbook where fk_employeeNo=to_number(#{fk_employeeNo}) and COMPANY='flow up' order by DEPARTMENT, ADRSBNO desc

select FIRSTNAME||MIDDLENAME||LASTNAME AS name, COMPANY,DEPARTMENT,RANK,EMAIL,PHONENO,DIRECTCALL from tbl_addressbook where fk_employeeNo=to_number(#{fk_employeeNo}) and COMPANY !='flow up' order by DEPARTMENT, ADRSBNO desc
select department from tbl_addressBook where COMPANY ='flow up' group by department order by DEPARTMENT asc

WITH A AS ( SELECT E.name, E.employeeno, P.positionnam+e FROM tbl_employee E JOIN tbl_position P ON E.FK_positionno = P.positionno ), B AS ( SELECT E.employeeno, D.departmentno, D.departmentname FROM tbl_department D JOIN tbl_employee E ON E.FK_departmentno = D.departmentno ), C AS ( SELECT T.Teamname, D.departmentno FROM tbl_team T JOIN tbl_department D ON T.Fk_departmentno = D.departmentno ) SELECT A.name, A.employeeno, A.positionname, B.departmentname, C.Teamname FROM A JOIN B ON A.employeeno = B.employeeno JOIN C ON B.departmentno = C.departmentno ORDER BY A.employeeno desc
